http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv-community.gif http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif JORUM-UPDATE List JORUM-UPDATE List Archives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=JORUM-UPDATE&v=ATOM1.0
This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=JORUM-UPDATE.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-03-11T08:37:37Z Siobhan Burke 2015-03-11T08:37:33+00:00 2015-03-11T08:37:33+00:00 FW: ALT open ed sig webinar https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JORUM-UPDATE;b13c8ec7.1503 This webinar may be of interest to attendees - potential or confirmed - about the upcoming OER 15 conference<https://oer15.oerconf.org/> happening in Cardiff on 14th - 15th April.<br><br>-----Original Message-----<br>From: Open Education Special Interest Group [mailto:OPENEDSIG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Teresa MacKinnon<br>Sent: 11 March 2015 08:22<br>To: OPENEDSIG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: ALT open ed sig webinar<br><br>Yesterday the Open Ed SIG held a preview webinar to share information about the plans for #oer15. You can find the story of the session as tweeted here: [...] Siobhan Burke 2015-03-05T08:28:50+00:00 2015-03-05T08:28:50+00:00 FW: Hairdressing Training service project officer - Job opportunity at Jisc Manchester https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JORUM-UPDATE;c44ff298.1503 Hello,<br><br>The following job opportunity may be of interest to this list...<br><br>From: Hairdressing Training [mailto:HAIRDRESSING@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Siobhan Burke<br>Sent: 05 March 2015 08:24<br>To: HAIRDRESSING@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Hairdressing Training service project officer - Job opportunity at Jisc Manchester<br><br>Dear colleagues,<br><br>We are looking to recruit a Project Officer for the Hairdressing Training Service to support the delivery and continuing development of the service. Further particulars are available on the Jisc website: http://www.jisc.ac.uk/jobs/hairdressing-training-service-project-officer. The closing date for applications is 12:00 on Wednesday 18th March. [...] Siobhan Burke 2015-02-13T08:49:27+00:00 2015-02-13T08:49:27+00:00 OER15 Registration & Early bird until 16th February! https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JORUM-UPDATE;379f5fb.1502 Dear Colleagues,<br><br>This is a reminder that registration is now open for OER15, the international conference on Open Educational Resources. The 'early bird' rate is available until February 16th. Our venue is the impressive Royal Welsh College of Music and Drama, Cardiff on 14-15 April 2015. Please register with us here: http://oer15.oerconf.org/.<br>The Open Education Conference is an International Conference currently organised by a volunteer committee from the Open Education Community and hosted by OER Wales Cymru, Universities Wales and the Association for Learning Technology (ALT). Wherever you are in the world, and whatever your role e.g. staff, students or [...] Siobhan Burke 2015-02-12T16:06:20+00:00 2015-02-12T16:06:20+00:00 Re: New Jorum website preview available + Upload issue https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JORUM-UPDATE;38ce6103.1502 Thanks for you feedback Massoud,<br><br>We are exploring ways of implementing functionality similar to Pinterest in the near future. Watch this space!<br><br>Best wishes,<br><br>Siobh\ufffd\ufffdn<br><br>From: Massoud Alshareef [mailto:massoud@kwareict.com]<br>Sent: 12 February 2015 07:45<br>To: Siobhan Burke<br>Cc: JORUM-UPDATE@jiscmail.ac.uk<br>Subject: Re: New Jorum website preview available + Upload issue<br><br>This is a piece of work. I think the new Jorum UI will be appreciated by so many. [...] Massoud Alshareef 2015-02-12T10:44:43+03:00 2015-02-12T10:44:43+03:00 Re: New Jorum website preview available + Upload issue https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JORUM-UPDATE;724c717.1502 This is a piece of work. I think the new Jorum UI will be appreciated by so<br>many.<br><br>I think we need to realize that academic environments need to compete with<br>interfaces like Pinterest and Instagram too, in a very attractive and easy<br>access fashion.<br><br>Thanks,<br>Massoud M. AlShareef,<br><br>\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd<br>The world of achievement has always belonged to the optimist! It's quite a change to the existing site so we didn't want it to be a shock when it is released. [...] Pete Collins 2015-02-04T15:45:31+00:00 2015-02-04T15:45:31+00:00 Re: Jorum & Mozilla Open Badges - Focus Group participants needed from the FE sector https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JORUM-UPDATE;c1512177.1502 Afternoon everybody,<br><br>I've had a very good response to my email below regarding a one off<br>Focus Group on Open Badges and Jorum. Just thought I'd send out a quick<br>reminder as you still have until the end of end of Friday 6th Feb if<br>you'd like to participate. I'm particular keen to hear from teaching staff. [...] Siobhan Burke 2015-01-29T09:25:57+00:00 2015-01-29T09:25:57+00:00 FW: Reminder about the webinar tomorrow (Thursday) https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JORUM-UPDATE;f8721ade.1501 (Apologies for cross-posting)<br><br>The following webinar may be of interest to members of this list:<br><br>From: Open Education Special Interest Group [mailto:OPENEDSIG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Terry Loane<br>Sent: 28 January 2015 22:07<br>To: OPENEDSIG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Reminder about the webinar tomorrow (Thursday)<br><br>A quick reminder of the webinar - tomorrow (if you're reading this message on Wednesday evening) or today (if you are reading it on Thursday 29 January): [...] Siobhan Burke 2015-01-22T19:00:45+00:00 2015-01-22T19:00:45+00:00 OER Schools Guidance resources from Leicester City Council now available on Jorum https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JORUM-UPDATE;6e36ba4f.1501 Hello,<br><br>OER Schools Guidance resources from Leicester City Council were released last October, which some of you may have spotted at the time. But now they are also available in Jorum. Read our latest blog post<http://www.jorum.ac.uk/blog/post/98/oer-schools-guidance-resources-from-leicester-city-council-now-available-on-jorum> for more information.<br><br>Josie Fraser, who led on this development, has also written a User Story<http://www.jorum.ac.uk/squeezy/cms/media/493hr2jbbxjh.pdf> for Jorum about OER and the wider project happening with schools under Leicester City Council. [...] Pete Collins 2015-01-21T16:25:13+00:00 2015-01-21T16:25:13+00:00 Jorum & Mozilla Open Badges - Focus Group participants needed from the FE sector https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JORUM-UPDATE;f4819929.1501 Hello all,<br><br>Jorum are currently investigating the implementation of Mozilla Open<br>Badges <http://openbadges.org/about/> to reward and encourage the<br>depositing, re-purposing and remixing of OERs.<br><br>Because we want to engage and consult with the OER community, we are<br>proposing that we hold a focus group ahead of the project Pilot (due to<br>start in June 2015), and we're keen to get a representational group from<br>across the FE and Skills sector in the UK, to include different roles. [...] Siobhan Burke 2015-01-12T14:28:24+00:00 2015-01-12T14:28:24+00:00 Re: Jorum Deposit - Now available again https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JORUM-UPDATE;4672e86d.1501 We have now resolved the issue and it is possible to deposit resources in Jorum again.<br><br>Best wishes,<br><br>Siobh\ufffd\ufffdn Burke<br><br>[Jisc]<http://www.jisc.ac.uk/><br>Siobh\ufffd\ufffdn Burke<br>OER Service Manager<br><br>T 0161 275 6803<br>Skype SiobhanBurke79<br>Twitter @SiobhanBurke79<br>5.14 Roscoe Building, University of Manchester, Oxford Road, Manchester M13 9PL<br><br>jisc.ac.uk<http://www.jisc.ac.uk/><br>Jisc is a registered charity (number 1149740) and a company limited by guarantee which is registered in England under Company No. 5747339, VAT No. GB 882 5529 90. Jisc’s registered office is: One Castlepark, Tower Hill, Bristol, BS2 0JA. T 0203 697 5800. jisc.ac.uk<http://www.jisc.ac.uk/> Siobhan Burke 2015-01-12T13:46:11+00:00 2015-01-12T13:46:11+00:00 Jorum Deposit temporarily unavailable - Monday 12th Janaury https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JORUM-UPDATE;2716ff04.1501 Dear colleagues,<br><br>We are currently resolving a problem with Jorum's repository as a result of some service improvement work last week. It also means that the most recent resources are currently unavailable including our Featured Resources. The Jorum team is sorry for any inconvenience caused. Once the problem has been resolved, Jorum will be significantly more robust and reliable. The subject is:<br><br>Creative Commons - understanding the basics (CC for Dummies)<br><br>It will include Jorum's Educational Technologist, Pete Collins, presenting the CC licence quiz alongside Vivien Sieber from the University of Surrey. [...] Siobhan Burke 2014-12-05T08:36:19+00:00 2014-12-05T08:36:19+00:00 FW: Issues in creating and using video resources for language teaching https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JORUM-UPDATE;bf1c9c34.1412 Hello,<br><br>The following webinar recording may be of use and/or interest to this list.<br><br>Best wishes,<br><br>Siobh\ufffd\ufffdn Burke<br><br>-----Original Message-----<br>From: Open Education Special Interest Group [mailto:OPENEDSIG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Teresa MacKinnon<br>Sent: 05 December 2014 08:17<br>To: OPENEDSIG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Re: Issues in creating and using video resources for language teaching<br><br>I am pleased to share the recording link for the November Joint sig webinar, now available here https://warwick.mediaspace.kaltura.com/media/ALT+joint+sig+oer+recording/1_ajbru8ds/6227901 [...] Siobhan Burke 2014-11-28T16:40:02+00:00 2014-11-28T16:40:02+00:00 OER15 in Cardiff: Mainstreaming Open Education - call for abstracts E-X-T-E-N-D-E-D to 1 Dec https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JORUM-UPDATE;ebd0f4bf.1411 Dear colleague,<br>OER15: Mainstreaming Open Education<br><br>This is a reminder of the call for abstracts at OER15. *The call for abstracts has been extended to Monday 1 Dec. All you need to put in is 500 words.<br><br>Abstracts are not limited to the presentation of papers - workshops and posters are also invited and alternative formats welcomed, so surprise us with something creative! [...] Siobhan Burke 2014-10-15T07:45:10+00:00 2014-10-15T07:45:10+00:00 Webinar series in November & December to support OER initiatives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JORUM-UPDATE;6b00efe1.1410 The following webinars run and delivered by the Open Education Special Interest Group<https://www.alt.ac.uk/get-involved/special-interest-groups/oer-sig> of ALT may be useful to members of this list.
